## InjectedRemirrorProps.clearContent() method

Clears all editor content

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearContent(triggerOnChange?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  triggerOnChange | <code>boolean</code> | whether onChange handlers should be triggered by the update. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
